structure.unit: ARTICLE XXXIII(T). PALMER LAKE METROPOLITAN URBAN CENTER DISTRICT (PLMUC)

text.section:
Sec. 33-284.99.63. Zoning hearing review.
Relief from the following requirements of this Article shall be permitted only pursuant to the standards and requirements of(A)(4)(a) of this chapter:
Building frontage requirements.
Storefront requirements.
Habitable space requirements.
